info.description:
### Routine-Tasks

Routine-Tasks is a simple but powerful to-do list that focuses on repeating/recurring tasks.
It supports tasks with minutely, hourly, daily, weekly, monthly and yearly intervals with variable number of intervals, specific weekdays and specific dates.
It is designed to work on Linux distributions and is coded using Gtk+ 3 and Python 3. Porting to Windows and other platforms may be considered after the initial release.


### Current Status: Infrastructure Setup
[![pipeline status](https://gitlab.com/Routine-Tasks/Routine-Tasks/badges/master/pipeline.svg)](https://gitlab.com/Routine-Tasks/Routine-Tasks/commits/master) [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/routine-tasks-desktop/badge/?version=latest)](http://routine-tasks-desktop.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)

The software itself is feature complete but extensive testing is required. Consider it extremely buggy until proven otherwise. Make backups of all your tasks prior to entering it into the software and while using it. 
Also the development procedures and infrastructure havent been setup as yet. 

### Download

Once up and running, routine tasks can now be downloaded by running the following:

pip3 install routine-tasks


Python sources and wheels will also be available on pypi and the gitlab release page.
